name: Dice duel
description:
You've been greatly offended by Sir Robert but can't duel him ... unless Miss Ara has a plan for you, and she does.


How to play :

Drag and drop dices and operators in order to reach the goal.

You have a few tries to reroll your unused dices.

The result of the previous goal can be used for the current goal or be replaced by a new dice.

Credits :

NaejDoree - Game design, programming, main art

Amelie Le Chevanton - Narrative design, Game design

External credits :

Kenney NL - Icons

Dark fantasy studio - Musics
